insane.translation[0].definitions[0].def: completely stupid or crazy, often in a way that is dangerous
insane.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The whole idea sounds absolutely insane to me.
Why did you do that? Have you gone insane?
insane.translation[0].definitions[1].def: someone who is insane is permanently and seriously mentally ill so that they cannot live in normal society
insane.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The killer was declared criminally insane.
